Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class TeacherExamManagementController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.BaseManagementController<TeacherExamManagementController.QuizRecord>
comp3111.examsystem.controller.TeacherExamManagementController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class TeacherExamManagementController extends BaseManagementController<TeacherExamManagementController.QuizRecord>
Controller class for managing exams in the exam system. This class provides functionality for managing quizzes (exams), their associated questions, and metadata like course IDs, time, and publication status. It extends the BaseManagementController and interacts with the UI using JavaFX components.

Key Features:

  • View and manage exams (quizzes) and their metadata
  • Filter exams and questions based on criteria
  • Add, update, delete, and manage questions in exams
  • Load and save data from JSON files

    • loadQuestionInExamData

      protected void loadQuestionInExamData()
      Loads questions associated with the selected exam record into the exam data list. This method retrieves the questions for the selected quiz and updates the questionInExamDataList with the corresponding QuestionRecord objects.

      Specified by:
      validateInput in class BaseManagementController<TeacherExamManagementController.QuizRecord>

    • clearFilters

      protected void clearFilters()
      Clears all filters applied to the quiz records, resetting the filter fields to their default states. This method is used to show all available records without any filtering.
      Overrides:
      clearFilters in class BaseManagementController<TeacherExamManagementController.QuizRecord>

    • questionFilter

      protected void questionFilter(ActionEvent event)

      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the user action (e.g., button click).

      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the user action (e.g., button click).

    • clearQuestionFilters

      protected void clearQuestionFilters()
      Clears all question filters applied to the question records, resetting the filter fields to their default states. This method is used to show all available questions without any filtering.

    • delete

      protected void delete(ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the selected quiz record after user confirmation. This method checks if a record is selected, prompts the user for confirmation, and attempts to delete the record from storage. Alerts the user about the result of the deletion attempt.
